title: IND vs SA: Former India cricketer advises Shubman Gill to take a break - 'Skip the IPL' -
text: Shubman Gill's recent neck spasm has sparked debate on player workload. Despite a packed schedule, coach Gautam Gambhir believes players should skip the IPL if workload is an issue, not international duty. Aakash Chopra agrees, emphasizing maximizing form when fit and not mentally fatigued, as Gill faces a recovery period before upcoming series.
